item.title: Where to find income opportunity amid uncertainty, according to a Vanguard fund manager
item.description: These days, it pays for income investors to be flexible, according to Vanguard's Michael Chang.

item.title: Santoli's market wrap-up: Market holds on to Nvidia hope with little concern shown for Fed independence
item.description: Mike Santoli looks at the market set-up ahead of Nvidia's earnings report.

item.title: Why the Trump administration's Intel stake may not be a slam dunk for investors
item.description: Intel has essentially become a vehicle for U.S. industrial policy and investors will be taken along for the ride, according to Wolfe Research.

item.title: A main chip sector ETF is trapped in a box. Can Nvidia earnings break it out?
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down a bunch of charts on the VanEck Semiconductor ETF (SMH) ahead of Nvidia's results.

item.title: Watch out: These stocks are the most correlated to Nvidia as the earnings get set to hit the Street
item.description: Other semiconductors stocks could also rise in sympathy if Nvidia posts better-than-expected fiscal second-quarter results on Wednesday afternoon.
